author: Jane Norman
title: Australia's top doctor says eliminating coronavirus for good may be impossible 'nirvana'
description: Australia's Chief Medical Officer has given politicians in New Zealand an update on how we're faring against the virus. This is what we learned.
content:
Posted 
April 14, 2020 14:14:27
From the security of his office in Canberra, the nation's top doctor fielded questions from politicians across the ditch on Australia's response to COVID-19. 
Key points:
